price: (Onyankopͻn kaa sε): “Seesei (na woregye adie!) Ampa sε wadikan ayε asoͻden, na woka nsεmͻnedifoͻ no ho.
arabic: ءَآلۡـَٰٔنَ وَقَدۡ عَصَيۡتَ قَبۡلُ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: āl'āna waqad ʿaṣayta qablu wakunta mina al-muf'sidīna
